com.mousebird.maply

Class LayerThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • android.os.HandlerThread
        • com.mousebird.maply.LayerThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class LayerThread
extends android.os.HandlerThread
    The layer thread runs tasks we want off the UI thread, but still need some control over. The layer thread has some of its own state, including ChangeSets and similar objects.

    When you call addTask on the MaplyController, the Runnable probably ends up here.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

      • addTask

        public android.os.Handler addTask(java.lang.Runnable run)
        Add a Runnable to our queue. This will be executed at some point in the future.
        Parameters:
        run - Runnable to run
        Returns:
        The Handler if you want to cancel this at some point in the future.

      • addDelayedTask

        public android.os.Handler addDelayedTask(java.lang.Runnable run,
                                long time)
        Add a Runnable to the queue, but only execute after the given amount of time.
        Parameters:
        run - Runnable to add to the queue
        Returns:
        The Handler if you want to cancel this at some point in the future.

      • addTask

        public android.os.Handler addTask(java.lang.Runnable run,
                         boolean wait)
        Add a Runnable to this thread's queue. It will be executed at some point in the future.
        Parameters:
        run - Runnable to run
        wait - If true we'll always put the Runnable in the queue. If false we'll see if we're already on the layer thread and just execute the runnable instead.
        Returns:
        Returns a Handler if you want to cancel the task later. Returns null if we were on the layer thread and no Handler was needed.

      • addWatcher

        public void addWatcher(com.mousebird.maply.LayerThread.ViewWatcherInterface watcher)
        Add an object that we'd like to track changes to the view as the user moves around. This is typically called by a Layer in the startLayer() call.
        Parameters:
        watcher - Watcher to add to the list.

      • removeWatcher

        public void removeWatcher(com.mousebird.maply.LayerThread.ViewWatcherInterface watcher)
        Remove a view watcher that was added previously. That object will no longer get view updates.

        public void viewUpdated(View view)
